ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
[h2]A mod that sorts weapons based on various properties[/h2]
[list] [*]Option to sort by tech-level [*]Option to sort by mod-name [*]Option for grenades subcategory [*]Option for ranged subcategory [*]Option for melee subcategory [/list] [list] [*]Works with all weapons, modded and vanilla [*]Safe to add/remove from saves [*]Verified to work with CE [/list]
Russian translation by Reiquard Chinese translation by HawnHan French translation by qux
Keywords: Sort, filter, weapons, categories
